project.component: {:repl-history {:ide [], :local ["(use 'functional-programming.core)" "(println (filter #(= 0 (rem % 3)) mylist))" "(println (map #(/ (even? %) 2) mylist))" "(println (map #(/ (map even? %) 2) mylist))" "(println (map #(* % %) mylist))" "(let [even-list (map even? mylist)]\n (println (map (/ even-list 2) mylist)))" "(println (map #(/ % 2) mylist))" "(println (map #(double (/ % 2)) mylist))" "(println (map #(if (even? %) (double (/ % 2))\n :else %) mylist))" "(println (map #(if (even? %) (double (/ % 2)) %) mylist))"], :remote []}}
